title: VOLUME I Essay i. On the Pleasure of Painting

book.title: Table Talk : Essays on Men and Manners
book.description: 简介： There is a pleasure in painting which none but painters know. In writing, you have to contend with the world; in painting, you have only to carry on a friendly strife with Nature. You sit down to your task, and are happy. From the moment that you tak...
